titleStmt.title: A proclamation, whereas the Commissioners of the treasury of the late King James R.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1685-1688 : James II)
James II, King of England, 1633-1701.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the assigns of John Bill deceas'd, and by Henry Hills, and Thomas Newcomb ... ,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
At head of title: By the King, a proclamation.
At end of text: Given at our court at Whitehall, the sixteenth day of February, 1684/5.
Contract between Commissioners of Treasury and certain persons to raise yearly excise tax of £550,000.
